rows.name: Glamered
rows.stacking_rules: Cosmetic illusion; no mechanical stacking interactions

rows.name: Shadow
rows.stacking_rules: +5 competence on Hide; upgrades to Improved/Greater; don’t stack tiers

rows.name: Shadow, improved
rows.stacking_rules: Replaces Shadow; +10 competence on Hide

rows.name: Shadow, greater
rows.stacking_rules: Replaces Improved; +15 competence on Hide

rows.name: Silent moves
rows.stacking_rules: +5 competence on Move Silently; upgrades to Improved/Greater

rows.name: Silent moves, improved
rows.stacking_rules: Replaces Silent moves; +10

rows.name: Silent moves, greater
rows.stacking_rules: Replaces Improved; +15

rows.name: Slick
rows.stacking_rules: +5 competence on Escape Artist; upgrades to Improved/Greater

rows.name: Slick, improved
rows.stacking_rules: Replaces Slick; +10

rows.name: Slick, greater
rows.stacking_rules: Replaces Improved; +15

rows.name: Fortification, light
rows.stacking_rules: Does not stack with other fortification grades; choose one grade

rows.name: Fortification, moderate
rows.stacking_rules: Mutually exclusive with light/heavy

rows.name: Fortification, heavy
rows.stacking_rules: Mutually exclusive with light/moderate

rows.name: Ghost touch
rows.stacking_rules: Functions normally against incorporeal; wearer fully protected as described

rows.name: Invulnerability
rows.stacking_rules: Provides DR as per DMG; counts toward +10 effective cap

rows.name: Spell resistance (13)
rows.stacking_rules: Pick one SR tier only; tiers do not stack

rows.name: Spell resistance (15)
rows.stacking_rules: Pick one SR tier only; tiers do not stack

rows.name: Spell resistance (17)
rows.stacking_rules: Pick one SR tier only; tiers do not stack

rows.name: Spell resistance (19)
rows.stacking_rules: Pick one SR tier only; tiers do not stack

rows.name: Wild
rows.stacking_rules: Druid-friendly; functions while wild shaped; see DMG text

rows.name: Energy resistance (acid 10)
rows.stacking_rules: Choose one energy type per instance; tiers replace lower tiers

rows.name: Energy resistance (acid 20)
rows.stacking_rules: Replaces acid 10

rows.name: Energy resistance (acid 30)
rows.stacking_rules: Replaces acid 20

rows.name: Energy resistance (cold 10)
rows.stacking_rules: Choose one energy type per instance; tiers replace lower tiers

rows.name: Energy resistance (cold 20)
rows.stacking_rules: Replaces cold 10

rows.name: Energy resistance (cold 30)
rows.stacking_rules: Replaces cold 20

rows.name: Energy resistance (electricity 10)
rows.stacking_rules: Choose one energy type per instance; tiers replace lower tiers

rows.name: Energy resistance (electricity 20)
rows.stacking_rules: Replaces electricity 10

rows.name: Energy resistance (electricity 30)
rows.stacking_rules: Replaces electricity 20

rows.name: Energy resistance (fire 10)
rows.stacking_rules: Choose one energy type per instance; tiers replace lower tiers

rows.name: Energy resistance (fire 20)
rows.stacking_rules: Replaces fire 10

rows.name: Energy resistance (fire 30)
rows.stacking_rules: Replaces fire 20

rows.name: Energy resistance (sonic 10)
rows.stacking_rules: Choose one energy type per instance; tiers replace lower tiers

rows.name: Energy resistance (sonic 20)
rows.stacking_rules: Replaces sonic 10

rows.name: Energy resistance (sonic 30)
rows.stacking_rules: Replaces sonic 20

rows.name: Animated
rows.stacking_rules: Shield defends on its own; frees hands; shield only

rows.name: Arrow catching
rows.stacking_rules: Increases chance to intercept missiles; shield only

rows.name: Arrow deflection
rows.stacking_rules: Functions as the Deflect Arrows feat (with requirements); shield only

rows.name: Bashing
rows.stacking_rules: Increases shield bash damage; shield only

rows.name: Reflecting
rows.stacking_rules: Reflects targeted spells as per DMG; shield only

rows.name: Ghost touch
rows.stacking_rules: Shield functions normally against incorporeal; shield only

rows.name: Acidic
rows.stacking_rules: Deals 2d4 acid per full round to grapplers/objects in continuous contact; no damage for <1 round contact; item immune.

rows.name: Agility
rows.stacking_rules: +1 resistance bonus on Reflex saves.

rows.name: Anchoring
rows.stacking_rules: +5 enhancement bonus to resist bull rush, overrun, trip.

rows.name: Aporter
rows.stacking_rules: 2/day dimension door (self + equipment) to visualized spot within 800 ft; standard action; mental activation.

rows.name: Averter
rows.stacking_rules: 3/day standard action: enemies seeing shield DC 14 Will or cannot approach within 30 ft for 3 rounds (mind-affecting compulsion).

rows.name: Axeblock
rows.stacking_rules: DR 5/bludgeoning or piercing (turns away slashing).

rows.name: Balance
rows.stacking_rules: +5 competence bonus on Balance checks.

rows.name: Bane Blind
rows.stacking_rules: 3/day swift: imperceptible to designated creature type/subtype for 10 rounds or until you attack; nonmagical senses cannot detect you.

rows.name: Beastskin
rows.stacking_rules: When using wild shape, expend +1 use to transform armor to same type fitted for new form; weight adjusts; proficiency carries over.

rows.name: Blinking
rows.stacking_rules: 1/day standard command: blink for 1 minute.

rows.name: Blueshine
rows.stacking_rules: Armor never tarnishes; immune to acid and rust; +2 competence on Hide checks.

rows.name: Blurring
rows.stacking_rules: Swift command: blur for 5 rounds; 3/day.

rows.name: Buoyant
rows.stacking_rules: No armor check penalty on Swim checks; +2 competence bonus on Swim checks.

rows.name: Called
rows.stacking_rules: Standard command: call armor/shield from anywhere on same plane; appears donned or in/adjacent square; loses call if worn by another since last worn.

rows.name: Commander
rows.stacking_rules: +2 competence Diplomacy; allies within 30 ft get +1 morale Will; wearer -5 Hide (in addition to ACP).

rows.name: Daylight
rows.stacking_rules: Swift command: daylight up to 30 min/day, not continuous; can deactivate with swift.

rows.name: Death Ward
rows.stacking_rules: Immediate mental: ignore one death effect or negative energy effect; 1/day.

rows.name: Deepdweller
rows.stacking_rules: Breathe water; immune to cold water and pressure; no ACP on Swim; converse with water-breathing creatures; see twice as far underwater (DMG 93).

rows.name: Displacement
rows.stacking_rules: Swift command 1/day: displacement for 5 rounds.

rows.name: Dragondodger
rows.stacking_rules: Evasion vs breath weapons (Reflex half → no damage on success).

rows.name: Easy Travel
rows.stacking_rules: Carry up to medium load as if light (ignores load-based max Dex, check penalty, speed reduction); can walk up to 10 hours/day before forced-march checks.

rows.name: Ectoplasmic Feedback
rows.stacking_rules: When hit by incorporeal touch, attacker takes 1d6 damage (no incorporeal miss chance).

rows.name: Ectoplasmic Wall
rows.stacking_rules: Standard command 1/day: create wall of ectoplasm (ten 10-ft squares or 10-ft radius sphere/hemisphere), 2" thick, 20 hp, hardness 5, break DC 19; blocks most effects and ethereal; duration 7 rounds or until shield picked up.

rows.name: Energy Immunity
rows.stacking_rules: Immediate mental 1/day: immunity to chosen energy (acid/cold/electricity/fire) for 1 minute; minor sensory cue per energy.

rows.name: Fearsome
rows.stacking_rules: Swift command: 20-ft aura; creatures Will DC 16 or panicked 1 round (shaken 1 round on success); 3/day.

rows.name: Freedom
rows.stacking_rules: Move and attack normally as per freedom of movement.

rows.name: Ghost Ward
rows.stacking_rules: Add enhancement bonus (not armor/shield bonus) to AC against touch (incl. incorporeal touch).

rows.name: Gilled
rows.stacking_rules: Water-breathing wearer can breathe and speak freely in air.

rows.name: Hammerblock
rows.stacking_rules: DR 5/piercing or slashing (turns away bludgeoning).

rows.name: Healing
rows.stacking_rules: Swift command or automatic at –1 to –9 hp: heal 2d8+5 hp; 1/day.

rows.name: Heartening
rows.stacking_rules: Immediate mental: gain 5 temp hp (max 5 min); does not stack with other temp hp; 2/day.

rows.name: Landing
rows.stacking_rules: Ignore damage from first 60 ft of a fall; may always land on feet.

rows.name: Linked
rows.stacking_rules: Standard mental 3/day: telepathic bond with known wearers of other linked items within 10 miles; lasts 1 hour.

rows.name: Magic-Eating
rows.stacking_rules: When you succeed on a save vs a spell that targets you, heal 1 hp per spell level after the spell takes effect.

rows.name: Manifester
rows.stacking_rules: Free mental 1/day: draw 3 power points from shield to manifest a psionic power; points must all be spent on that one power.

rows.name: Masking
rows.stacking_rules: Constant nondetection vs divinations (DC 25 caster level check to overcome) for you and gear.

rows.name: Menacing
rows.stacking_rules: Standard command: one creature within 30 ft with fewer HD must save (DC 10 + 1/2 HD + Cha) or be panicked 5 rounds; on success shaken 1 round; immune to further uses from same armor for 24h; 3/day.

rows.name: Mindarmor
rows.stacking_rules: Immediate mental: +5 bonus on Will saves vs mind-affecting until start of your next turn; 3/day.

rows.name: Mobility
rows.stacking_rules: Gain Mobility feat (even if you lack prerequisites).

rows.name: Nimbleness
rows.stacking_rules: Max Dex +1; armor check penalty –2.

rows.name: Quickness
rows.stacking_rules: +5 ft enhancement bonus to land speed.

rows.name: Radiant
rows.stacking_rules: Resistance 10 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, sonic; radiates bright/shadowy light for rounds equal to damage absorbed (max 10), overlapping durations do not stack.

rows.name: Ranged
rows.stacking_rules: Throw shield (range incr 30 ft); deals 1d6 (buckler/light) or 1d8 (heavy) slashing + Str + enhancement; returns before next turn; no shield AC while away; cannot be tower shields.

rows.name: Retaliation
rows.stacking_rules: Each time you take ≥10 damage from a single melee attack, attacker takes 1d6 damage; if that attack drops you below 0 hp, attacker takes 3d6; damage is magic.

rows.name: Roaring
rows.stacking_rules: Negates damage from nonmagical projectiles that would deal ≤10 damage and reflects them to attacker (reroll damage); +4 competence on initiative (roaring dragon head warns of battle).

rows.name: Soulbound
rows.stacking_rules: Swift mental: invest essentia to increase enhancement bonus to AC by +1 per point (max +3); essentia capacity 2; chakra binds grant insight bonuses (see MoI).

rows.name: Spearblock
rows.stacking_rules: DR 5/bludgeoning or slashing (turns away piercing).

rows.name: Speed
rows.stacking_rules: Swift mental 3/day: haste on you for 1 round.

rows.name: Stamina
rows.stacking_rules: +1 resistance bonus on Fortitude saves.

rows.name: Styptic
rows.stacking_rules: Prevents ongoing blood loss; bleeding wounds automatically close; stabilize if dying; 25% chance to negate Con-draining blood drain effects.

rows.name: Time Buttress
rows.stacking_rules: Standard mental 1/day: invulnerable to all attacks, spells, powers (harmful or helpful) until end of your next turn.

rows.name: Twilight
rows.stacking_rules: Reduces arcane spell failure chance by 10%.

rows.name: Vanishing
rows.stacking_rules: Standard mental 2/day: become invisible/inaudible/undetectable by nonmagical senses for 3 minutes or until you attack; mind-affecting-immune creatures perceive you normally.

rows.name: Variable
rows.stacking_rules: Swift mental: change size among buckler/light/heavy/tower (appropriately sized); normal shield-carrying rules apply.

rows.name: Woodwalk
rows.stacking_rules: If you have woodland stride, standard command 3/day: tree stride (1 round).

rows.name: Energy defense
rows.stacking_rules: Synergy: requires energy resistance on the same armor; +2 to existing resistance; 1/day immediate or standard preactivation; melee attackers take 1d6+10 of that energy type (reach weapons exempt); lasts 10 rounds.

rows.name: Energy immunity
rows.stacking_rules: Choose energy type on activation; 1/day; lockout 24h.

rows.name: Fortifying defense, light
rows.stacking_rules: Synergy: requires corresponding fortification. When fortification negates a crit/sneak, target must make DC 20 Will save or cannot crit or sneak attack any target for 1d4 rounds; threats are normal hits (no confirmation).

rows.name: Fortifying defense, moderate
rows.stacking_rules: Synergy: requires corresponding fortification. When fortification negates a crit/sneak, target must make DC 20 Will save or cannot crit or sneak attack any target for 1d4 rounds; threats are normal hits (no confirmation).

rows.name: Fortifying defense, heavy
rows.stacking_rules: Synergy: requires corresponding fortification. When fortification negates a crit/sneak, target must make DC 20 Will save or cannot crit or sneak attack any target for 1d4 rounds; threats are normal hits (no confirmation).

rows.name: Slippery mind
rows.stacking_rules: Grants second saving throw 1 round after failing a save vs. enchantment; no effect if wearer already has slippery mind class feature.

rows.name: Slippery aura
rows.stacking_rules: Synergy: requires slippery mind on the same armor. Standard action; allies within 10 ft gain slippery mind for 10 minutes; 1/day.

rows.name: Spell trapping
rows.stacking_rules: Synergy: requires spell resistance on the same armor. When a targeted spell fails to overcome SR, store it (up to 5th level, 1/day) and later release it; armor's SR is +2 higher.
